properties.areaDesc: Waters from Lower Atchafalaya River to Intracoastal City LA from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from Intracoastal City to Cameron LA from 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from Lower Atchafalaya River to Intracoastal City LA out 20 NM
properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 13 at 8:08AM CST until January 13 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles LA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Dense fog will reduce visibility to less than one mile.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Lower Atchafalaya River to
Intracoastal City LA out 20 NM, Waters from Intracoastal City
to Cameron LA from 20 to 60 NM and Waters from Lower
Atchafalaya River to Intracoastal City LA from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...Until 4 PM CST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Low visibility will make navigation difficult.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dense fog will spread north and west in
the coastal waters tonight.
properties.instruction:
If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON
